    • 方法详细资料

      • toJSON

        public static String toJSON(Object object)
                     throws IOException
        Converting object to JSON string. If errors appears throw MeshinException runtime exception.
        参数:
        object - The object to convert.
        返回:
        The JSON string representation.
        抛出:
        IOException - IO issues
        SwiftJsonMarshallingException - failure to generate JSON

      • toObject

        public static <T> T toObject(String value,
             Class<T> klazz)
                  throws IOException
        Convert string representation to object. If errors appears throw Exception runtime exception.
        参数:
        value - The JSON string.
        klazz - The class to convert.
        返回:
        The Object of the given class.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • toObject

        public static <T> T toObject(String value,
             org.codehaus.jackson.type.TypeReference<T> typeReference)
                  throws IOException
        类型参数:
        T - type
        参数:
        value - json string
        typeReference - class type reference
        返回:
        deserialized T object
        抛出:
        IOException

      • toObject

        public static <T> T toObject(String value,
             org.codehaus.jackson.map.type.CollectionType collectionType)
                  throws IOException
        类型参数:
        T - type
        参数:
        value - json string
        collectionType - class describing how to deserialize collection of objects
        返回:
        deserialized T object
        抛出:
        IOException
